text: Columbia County is a county in the U.S. state of Georgia. As of the 2020 census, 156,010 people lived there. The legal county seat is Appling, but the de facto seat of county government is Evans.Columbia Court House at Carl Vinson Institute of Government, University of Georgia, website. Accessed February 15, 2008. == References == Category:1790s establishments in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:1790 establishments in the United States Category:Georgia (U.S. state) counties
title: Columbia County, Georgia
